description:
Shuichi and Saori continue to work on the script for the genderbent play that will be performed during the cultural festival.  However, they aren`t making much progress due to conflicting opinions.  Saori says that Shuichi`s script describes his wish to be loved as a girl by Yoshino. In the mean time, Yoshino invites Shuichi on a cross-dressing date after receiving advice from Yuki-san about buying underwear.  Shuichi, who is finally aware of his own feelings thanks to Saori, decides to tell Yoshino how he feels, but...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I`ll Give You My Name: The Sound of Your Name
Watashi no Namae o Ageru: The Sound of Your Name
私の名前をあげる ~The sound of your name~
